reviewDetails.comment: Dr Latkany has been an excellent doctor for the 5 years as his patient.

I have been seeing Dr. Latkany for many years. Dr. Latkany always takes the time to listen to your issues and tries different approaches to alleviate the problem.  He works with pharmaceutical companies and their products to see which one is the right fit for each individual. He is by far the best.
I’ve been a patient of Dr Latkany’s for many years. Highly recommend his practice.
He is the best!  I am so happy I found him.  Very knowledgeable, great personality, very accommodating and nice office staff.
He's great. Very professional and great bedside manner.

Dr. Latkany is the only doctor I've ever been to (and I've been to plenty) who was able to alleviate my painful dry eye symptoms.  He's attentive and the best in the field.  I couldn't recommend him more!
He is very professional and through

reviewDetails.comment: Excellent doctor!  I highly recommend him.
He has a terrible bedside manner. I also ended up going to another Dr on site to correct the prisms in my glasses and they're still not 100%
Remembers me.  Nice.  Explains well.  Patient.
Dr.Hufnagal is an excellent doctor…
Everything was good, except for a person in the office!
He is an excellent ophthalmologist.  He listens carefully and takes time to evaluate the situation very seriously.  I highly recommend him.
A class act I’ve been seeing for 16 years
Dr Hufnagel is very caring and knowledgeable. I would highly recommend him.

reviewDetails.comment: Dr Kreditor was through and efficient. Highly recommended.
He is very knowledgeable, thorough and reassuring. Recommend him to anyone else

He is extremely thorough, he very professional and a great physician.
Excellent. Thorough.  Great bedside manner. Very knowledgeable.
excellent doctor!
